Q_DESC:
A grocer has a scale of Rs. S1,Rs . S2, Rs. S3 ,Rs. S4 and Rs. S5  for 5 consecutive months. How much sale must he have in the sixth month so that he gets an average sale for Rs.X?

Write a C program to compute the sale in the 6th Format:

Input format:

Input consists of 5 integers and 1 float. The five integers corresponds to s1,s2,s3,s4,s5. The float input corresponds to x.
